fields.description:
*Assessment*

When registering an OSG, the following can be seen:
{code}
[root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca_conf --register-osg 10.104.1.194
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	osg-10.104.1.194	DISABLED  	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:osg-10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_194         	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_194/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_194         	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_194/
SERVICE	compute        	compute        	COM_194        	LOADED    	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:COM_194/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_194        	LOADED    	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Euare 	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_194/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_194         	LOADED    	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_194/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_194        	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_194/
{code}

This will cause extra cruft to be added to the services output where the OSG is not a valid OSG.  See EUCA-8951.

This also affect registration of other services as well.  For example, the AutoScaling service shows up as BROKEN:
{code}
[root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-describe-services
SERVICE	notifications  	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	autoscalingback	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	808s&Heartbreak	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:808s&Heartbreak/
SERVICE	cluster        	LoveLockdown   	RoboCop        	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:LoveLockdown:cluster:RoboCop/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Dns   	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Jetty 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	imaging        	imaging        	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:bootstrap:imaging:imaging:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_194        	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Euare 	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_194/
SERVICE	euare          	euare          	EUA_BadNews    	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Euare 	arn:euca:bootstrap:euare:euare:EUA_BadNews/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_194         	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_194/
SERVICE	cloudwatch     	cloudwatch     	CW_BadNews     	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/CloudWatch	arn:euca:bootstrap:cloudwatch:cloudwatch:CW_BadNews/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbacke	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	OSG_BadNews    	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:OSG_BadNews/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	osg-10.104.1.194	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:osg-10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	objectstorage  	objectstorage  	osg-10.104.1.94	BROKEN    	600 	http://10.104.1.94:8773/services/objectstorage	arn:euca:bootstrap:objectstorage:objectstorage:osg-10.104.1.94/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_194        	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_194/
SERVICE	tokens         	tokens         	TOK_BadNews    	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:bootstrap:tokens:tokens:TOK_BadNews/
SERVICE	reporting      	bootstrap      	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Reporting	arn:euca:bootstrap::reporting:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	compute        	compute        	COM_194        	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:COM_194/
SERVICE	compute        	compute        	COM_BadNews    	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/compute	arn:euca:bootstrap:compute:compute:COM_BadNews/
SERVICE	storage        	LoveLockdown   	Heartless      	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:LoveLockdown:storage:Heartless/
SERVICE	loadbalancingba	eucalyptus     	10.104.1.194   	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.104.1.194/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_194         	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_194/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_94          	BROKEN    	600 	http://10.104.1.94:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_94/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	AS_BadNews     	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:AS_BadNews/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_194         	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_194/
SERVICE	loadbalancing  	loadbalancing  	LB_BadNews     	ENABLED   	600 	http://10.104.1.194:8773/services/LoadBalancing	arn:euca:bootstrap:loadbalancing:loadbalancing:LB_BadNews/
{code}

Unlike the OSG not being able to be deregistered (EUCA-8952), the autoscaling service can be deregistered:
{code}
[root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca_conf --deregister-autoscaling --partition autoscaling --component AS_94 --host 10.104.1.94
{code}

*Steps*

* Set up a Eucalyptus 4.0.0 cloud
* Register an OSG of a non-existent host/IP (see EUCA-8951)
* Observe the services that show up after the OSG has been registered
fields.summary: Registering an OSG Registers Other Components Which Can Lead to Services Cruft
